translations: 研究者，调查者（investigator 的复数形式）；[法]审查者（investigator 的复数形式）

sentences.sentence: Investigators are trying to reconstruct the circumstances of the crash.
sentences.translation: 调查人员正试图重现撞车时的情形。

sentences.sentence: He angrily accused the investigators of slandering both him and his family.
sentences.translation: 他气愤地指责调查者诋毁他和他的家人。

sentences.sentence: Crash investigators have been sifting through the wreckage of the aircraft.
sentences.translation: 调查坠机事件的专家一直在仔细检查飞机残骸。
